page.title: 01TATTERSHALL AND CONINGSBY
page.content: Our area consists of mainly countryside.We have two villages Coningsby and Tattershall separated by the River Bain which flows into the River Witham at Dogdyke. There is an Anglican church in each village. We have a lot of farmland and quite a few estates.There are four schools, Coningsby Junior,Clinton Park County Primary,Curzon Junior and Gartree which is a secondary modern school.Children from the junior schools go here or to Queen Elizabeth Grammar School in Horncastle at the age of 11. Tattershall castle is right near the church. In Coningsby Church there is the largest single handed clock in Europe. There is also an R.A.F. strike command airfield in Coningsby flying Tornados.
